title: Keerthy Suresh Shocked As Paparazzi Call Her 'Dosa', Baby John Actress Says 'Aur Dosa Mujhe...' | Watch - News18
summary:
Keerthy Suresh Reacts to Paparazzi Calling Her 'Dosa'

Date: December 28, 2024

Source: News18

Keerthy Suresh, who recently made her Bollywood debut with 'Baby John', was caught off guard when paparazzi referred to her as 'Dosa', leading to an amusing interaction.

  • Keerthy Suresh posed for paparazzi in Mumbai.
  • Paparazzi mistakenly called her 'Kriti', which she corrected to 'Keerthy'.
  • One photographer humorously called her 'Dosa', which annoyed her.
  • Keerthy responded, stating she's not 'Keerthy dosa' but 'Keerthy Suresh' and humorously added that she does like dosa.
  • Despite mixed reviews for 'Baby John', Keerthy's performance has been praised.
  • Keerthy Suresh married her long-time partner Antony on December 12, 2024.
“Keerthy Suresh’s Bollywood debut as Meera is another highlight of the film. Her nuanced dialogue delivery and expressive acting make her a scene-stealer.”

In light of the amusing encounter, Keerthy's charm continues to resonate with her audience.
newTitle: Keerthy Suresh Reacts to Paparazzi Calling Her 'Dosa'

title: Marathi Actress Urmila Kothare's Vehicle Runs Over Labourers In Mumbai, 1 Killed - News18
Urmila Kothare Accident: Marathi actress' car hits two metro workers in Mumbai - India TV News
summary:
Urmila Kothare Accident: Marathi actress' car hits two metro workers in Mumbai, one dead

Publication Date: December 28, 2024 | Source: India TV News

Marathi actress Urmila Kothare was involved in a car accident in Mumbai that resulted in the death of one metro worker and injury to another. The incident occurred while she was returning from a shoot.

  • The accident took place in the Kandivali area of Mumbai last Friday.
  • Kothare was in the back seat of the car, with the driver at the wheel, who was confirmed not to be under the influence of alcohol.
  • The airbag deployed correctly, keeping both Kothare and the driver unharmed.
  • A case has been registered against the driver at Samta Nagar Police Station.
“The police team is investigating this entire matter.”

Kothare is a well-known figure in Marathi cinema, recognized for her roles in various films and TV shows.
newTitle: Urmila Kothare Accident: Marathi Actress Involved in Fatal Car Incident

title: ‘It was horrible to work with Bipasha Basu and Karan Singh Grover, they demanded separate rooms’: Mika recalls producing web series - The Indian Express
summary:
Mika Singh Reflects on Challenging Experience with Bipasha Basu and Karan Singh Grover During Production

Published Date: December 2024 Source: The Indian Express

Mika Singh recounts his dire experience while producing the web series 'Dangerous', revealing challenges he faced working with actors Bipasha Basu and Karan Singh Grover.

  • Despite intentions to keep the project budget-friendly, Basu's insistence on joining Grover led to significant complications during shooting.
  • The project that was meant to take three months extended to six months, incurring heavy costs for Singh.
  • Issues included demands for separate accommodations and resistance to performing a previously agreed upon kissing scene.
  • Singh ultimately decided to cease producing films due to this problematic experience.
  • Both Salman Khan and Akshay Kumar advised Singh against pursuing production, predicting financial loss.
“It was the most horrible experience of my career.” - Mika Singh

In conclusion, Mika Singh's foray into film production serves as a cautionary tale about the unpredictability and potential turmoil of collaborating with established actors.
newTitle: Mika Singh Reflects on Challenging Experience with Bipasha Basu and Karan Singh Grover During Production

title: Sikandar teaser: Salman Khan annihilates army of samurais with shotguns, fans say 'mass ka baap is here'. Watch - Hindustan Times
summary:
Sikandar teaser: Salman Khan annihilates army of samurais with shotguns

Date: Dec 28, 2024

Source: Hindustan Times

The teaser for director AR Murugadoss’ film Sikandar featuring Salman Khan and Rashmika Mandanna has been released, showcasing intense action sequences and a thrilling glimpse of the movie.

  • The teaser was released a day late due to the death of former Prime Minister Manmohan Singh.
  • The 1-minute-41-second video highlights Salman’s character entering a trap filled with armed samurais.
  • Fans expressed excitement, with many praising the massy avatar Salman is portraying.
  • Sikandar is set to release in theatres on Eid 2025.
  • The film is produced by Sajid Nadiadwala under Nadiadwala Grandson Entertainment.
“Ab intezaar hua khatam. Here’s presenting a glimpse of the world of Sikandar.” - Film’s producers

In conclusion, the teaser has generated significant buzz among fans, marking a strong follow-up to Salman Khan’s previous works and setting high expectations for its release.

title: Actor Urmila Kothare's car runs over labourers in Mumbai, 1 killed - Hindustan Times
summary:
Actor Urmila Kothare's Car Runs Over Labourers in Mumbai, 1 Killed

Date: Dec 28, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

In a tragic incident in Kandivali, Mumbai, actress Urmila Kothare's car lost control and hit two Metro workers, resulting in one death and another serious injury.

  • The accident occurred while Kothare was returning from work near Poisar Metro station.
  • One labourer died on the spot, while the other sustained severe injuries.
  • Both the actress and her driver suffered minor injuries due to airbags deploying.
  • The police have filed a case against the driver and initiated an investigation.
“Urmila Kothare's car hit two labourers who were engaged in Metro rail work under the Poisar Metro station…” - Police Official

The incident has raised concerns about road safety, particularly following other recent accidents in Mumbai. An investigation is underway to determine the cause.
newTitle: Tragic Car Accident Involves Actress Urmila Kothare in Mumbai

title: Due to poor collections, shows of Baby John replaced with Hindi version of Marco; Industry SHOCKED as PVR Inox Pictures manages to release Varun Dhawan-starrer in just 4 out of 275 single screens in CP Berar - Bollywood Hungama
summary:
Baby John Faces Poor Box Office Performance; Shows Replaced by Hindi Version of Marco

Publication Date: December 25, 2024 | Source: Bollywood Hungama

The film Baby John, starring Varun Dhawan, has had a disappointing start at the box office with collections dropping dramatically. As a result, many theaters have begun replacing its shows with the Hindi version of Marco.

  • Opening day collection: Rs. 11.25 crores.
  • Second day drop to Rs. 5.13 crores.
  • Predicted weekend collection could be under Rs. 30 crores.
  • The film's shows are being replaced by Marco, Pushpa 2, and Mufasa: The Lion King.
  • Only 4 out of 275 single-screen theaters in CP Berar are showing Baby John.
“On Thursday, the film suffered a huge drop which made it clear for the exhibitors that it won’t even grow on Friday.”

This situation raises concerns about distribution strategies and the future of films in theatrical releases as audiences clearly show preference for other titles.
newTitle: Baby John Faces Poor Box Office Performance; Shows Replaced by Hindi Version of Marco

title: Bombay Velvet’s Failure Still Haunts Amit Trivedi: 'It Shouldn’t Have Been This Bad' - News18
summary:
Bombay Velvet’s Failure Still Haunts Amit Trivedi: 'It Shouldn’t Have Been This Bad'

Publication Date: December 28, 2024

Source: News18

In a recent interview, composer Amit Trivedi expressed deep regret over the failure of the film Bombay Velvet, despite putting in four years of hard work on its music.

  • The film, directed by Anurag Kashyap, starred Ranbir Kapoor and Anushka Sharma.
  • Trivedi shared that the film's massive failure was one of the lowest points of his career.
  • He struggled with feelings of hopelessness after the film's release and questioned his direction in life.
  • Despite the setback, Trivedi highlighted his efforts to integrate Jazz into Bollywood music through Bombay Velvet.
“Everything was a disaster. The film came and did not work. So horrible; it shouldn’t have been so bad.”

Trivedi is celebrated for his work in multiple hit films and has received a National Film Award for Best Music Director.
newTitle: Amit Trivedi Reflects on Bombay Velvet's Disastrous Reception

title: “Samay Raina won't follow brand guidelines, but delivers ROI” - afaqs!
summary:
Samay Raina's Unique Influence: Profits vs. Brand Guidelines

Publication Date: 2023-10-10   Source: Afaqs

In a recent commentary, Deepti Karthik reflects on her experience collaborating with comedian Samay Raina, highlighting the paradoxical nature of influencer marketing and its impact on sales despite brand guideline strife.

  • Karthik describes the influencer collaboration as their most profitable, generating over Rs. 25 lakh in two months despite initial negative sentiments.
  • Raina charged Rs. 5 lakh for the post but did not adhere closely to brand guidelines, leading to the post's removal.
  • Karthik suggests that Raina's use of dark humor may increase consumer engagement by provoking deeper thoughts about products.
  • This paradox demonstrates the complex dynamics of influencer marketing, where sales can occur despite contradictory brand messaging.
“Partner with Samay at your own risk concerning brand metrics, but I can assure you it will drive sales.”

This case highlights the ongoing debate among marketers regarding the trade-offs between brand safety and the potential for virality in influencer partnerships.
newTitle: Samay Raina's Unique Influence: Profits vs. Brand Guidelines

title: Kalki 2 can wait; For Deepika, daughter Dua is her first priority - 123telugu
summary:
Deepika Padukone Prioritizes Daughter Dua Over Film Projects

Published on Dec 28, 2024 2:00 pm IST

Bollywood actress Deepika Padukone emphasizes her commitment to her daughter Dua amid her busy career, stating that she is in no rush to resume filming the highly anticipated sequel, Kalki 2.

  • Deepika starred in the first part of Kalki 2898 AD and is expected to have a larger role in the sequel.
  • She prioritizes raising her daughter herself over returning to work, rejecting the idea of hiring a nanny.
  • Kalki 2 also stars Amitabh Bachchan and Kamal Haasan and is set to begin filming in summer 2025.
  • The sequel is anticipated to release in theaters worldwide in 2026.
“I will raise my daughter myself, just the way my mom raised me,” said Deepika Padukone.

This statement underscores Deepika's values as she balances her roles as a mother and a film star.
newTitle: Deepika Padukone Prioritizes Daughter Dua Over Film Projects

title: Keerthy Suresh gets annoyed and schools paparazzi, as they call her 'dosa', get her name wrong. Watch - Hindustan Times
summary:
Keerthy Suresh Schools Paparazzi Over Name Miscommunication

Date: Dec 28, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Keerthy Suresh recently had a confrontation with paparazzi in Mumbai when they mispronounced her name and referred to her with a controversial nickname. The incident highlights the challenges faced by South Indian actors in Bollywood.

  • Keerthy Suresh was in Mumbai for the release of her Bollywood debut, Baby John, starring Varun Dhawan.
  • Paparazzi miscalled her name as 'Kriti', which she promptly corrected.
  • The term 'dosa' was used by some photographers, which annoyed her.
  • She humorously replied, “Keerthy dosa nahi, Keerthy Suresh. Aur dosa mujhe pasand hai” (I'm not Keerthy dosa but Keerthy Suresh. But I like dosa).
  • Keerthy recently married Antony Thattil on December 12, 2024.
“Kriti nahi Keerthy.”

This incident underscores the cultural nuances and identity challenges faced by actors from different film industries as they navigate their careers in Bollywood.
newTitle: Keerthy Suresh Schools Paparazzi Over Name Miscommunication

In the latest episode of Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin, tensions rise as misunderstandings between the characters lead to dramatic consequences. Rajat misinterprets Savi's actions, believing she is planning to divorce him.

title: #2024Recap: 19 most EMBARRASSING scenes and dialogues in Bollywood films this year - Bollywood Hungama
summary:
#2024Recap: 19 most EMBARRASSING scenes and dialogues in Bollywood films this year

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Bollywood Hungama

This article highlights 19 cringeworthy scenes and dialogues from Hindi films released in 2024 that left audiences feeling embarrassed.

  • Crakk: Tension built as a character threatens everyone with a bomb that curiously spares the main characters.
  • Yodha: The film’s narrative took a confusing turn akin to Nolan’s filmmaking.
  • Bastar: The Naxal Story: Unintentionally funny portrayals of extremist groups borrowing from real historical contexts.
  • Swatantrya Veer Savarkar: Distorted historical events featuring characters that never actually met.
  • Bade Miyan Chote Miyan: A cringe-inducing reference with a character calling another a ‘snack’.
  • Love Sex Aur Dhokha 2: An unbelievable climax with an out-of-place animated AI plot.
  • Ruslaan: The male lead’s reckless decisions lead to problems for a female character who then falls for him instead of calling him out.
  • Ishq Vishk Rebound: Flawed performances leading to unintentional laughter.
  • Hindustani 2: A well-known actor’s embarrassing performance left audiences questioning the casting decisions.
  • Auron Mein Kahan Dum Tha: Predictable twists disappointed expectations.
  • Ulajh: Excessive product placements raised laughs for the wrong reasons.
  • Vedaa: A lack of security portrayed at a high court during a chaotic scene.
  • The Buckingham Murders: Forced story elements detracted from the mystery.
  • Vicky Vidya Ka Woh Wala Video: Unnecessary genre shifts confused viewers.
  • Jigra: Undercut character arcs and implausible climax upset audiences.
  • Kanguva: A messy plot presentation felt more like social media content than a cinematic experience.
  • The Sabarmati Report: Narrow blame placed on media reporting for a larger tragedy.
  • Naam: A strange lack of continuity when a gunshot impacts memory instead of physical harm.
  • Baby John: An intended emotional moment became a laughingstock.

Overall, the article emphasizes how these instances reflect poorly on Bollywood’s creativity and audience engagement this year.
newTitle: #2024Recap: 19 most EMBARRASSING scenes and dialogues in Bollywood films this year

Box Office: Top 10 Highest-Grossing Indian Films Of 2024 – Pushpa 2 Tops The List, Beating Prabhas’ Biggie With 54% Higher Collection In 22 Days! - Koimoi
summary:
Box Office: Pushpa 2 Tops the Highest-Grossing Indian Films of 2024

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: Koimoi

The storm of Pushpa 2 gripped the audience with a massive collection of over 1600 crore, surpassing Prabhas’ Kalki 2898 AD to become the highest-grossing Indian film of 2024.

  • Pushpa 2 grossed 1631.21 crores in just 22 days.
  • Kalki 2898 AD is the second-highest, with 1054.67 crores.
  • Stree 2, featuring Shraddha Kapoor, follows with 884.45 crores.
  • The Greatest Of All Time and Devara come in fourth and fifth with 464.54 crores and 428.39 crores, respectively.
“With such a number to its credit, the biggie has topped the list of the top 10 highest-grossing Indian films of 2024 by a huge margin.”

This year, Indian cinema has seen significant successes at the box office, with these films making a remarkable impact globally.
newTitle: Box Office: Pushpa 2 Tops the Highest-Grossing Indian Films of 2024
